Description: Fragment of oval handle to moderate turn of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine grey-red. Rectangular stamp with half ship symbol.
Type series: KT2045 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (299)
